message: Cult game, polarises opinions, famous for shaky production values and rough edges, has some fervent defenders, getting a lot of press a good year after it came out. Has anyone here played it? I feel this morbid pull towards trying it out.
I have a copy, but haven't had a chance to try it out yet. It seems Suda 51-ish, if Suda 51 had no money. Maybe we should discover this thing together?
It's on Games on Demand, so I think I shall try and download it tonight.
Always wanted to see if it holds up well to it's "so bad that it's good" reputation.

Eurogamer recently had an article on "The Cult of Deadly Premonition":

http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2011-07-07-the-cult-of-deadly-premonition-article
